Poetry collection

The English language never stops amazing me. These are some of my favourite poems. Some I've found aptly evoke or describe an emotional state I've felt. Others just make me smile.

  • Ulysses - Tennyson
  • The Rolling English Road - GK Chesterton
  • The Day is Done - Henry Longfellow
  • Sea Fever - John Masefield
  • The Road Not Taken - Robert Frost
  • When I Heard the Learn'd Astronomer - Walt Whitman
  • Cosmic Gall - John Updike
  • The Pessimist - P.G.Wodehouse
  • Do not go gentle into that good night - Dylan Thomas

Poets utter great and wise things
which they do not themselves understand.
-- Plato
